data.title: Real Estate Development & Lifestyle Company
data.meta_description: Since 1979, Related Group has enhanced skylines with real estate development characterized by innovative design, enduring quality and inclusive living. Learn more.
data.text:
Modern Luxury | March 20, 2024

Building the Skyline

Jorge M. Pérez and his sons continue to build a legacy of inspired living on the canvas of South Florida’s skyline.

Florida Trend | August 10, 2023

Passing the Baton

Related Group founder Jorge Pérez has overseen every detail of a vast real estate empire over the past 40 years. Now, sons Jon Paul and Nick are guiding the company through a generational shift.

Miami Living | July 01, 2023

Nick Perez Discusses the Future of Luxury Condo Developments in South Florida

Miami Living had an insightful conversation with Nick Perez, the President of Related Group’s condominium development division.

Mann Report | June 01, 2023

Related’s Casa Bella Residences by B&B Italia Sets Record for Miami’s Arts and Cultural District With $12.6M Penthouse Contract

Leading real estate developer Related Group (Related) and partner Alta Developers recently announced that Casa Bella Residences by B&B Italia (Casa Bella) has achieved nearly $50 million in signed contracts over the past 60 days.

Forbes | May 30, 2023

Wynwood’s Tech And Finance Boom Sparks Development Blitz

The Related Group is going all in on the condominium market in Miami’s Wynwood enclave with its

Travel + Leisure | April 05, 2023

This Stretch of Coast in South Florida Is Called ‘Millionaire Mile’ — and It’s Getting Brand-new Residences

Rosewood Residences Hillsboro Beach will be the first large-scale luxury development in the area in 20 years.

Inside Philanthropy | March 21, 2023

“Miami Is Our City.” How Two Generations of the Billionaire Pérez Family Give

Jorge Perez bets on Fisher Island with new luxury condo sales

Related Group sets target as Miami-area luxury residential prices continue to defy gravity

Jorge Pérez of Related Group donates record $33M to Miami Foundation

As the season of giving approaches, famed Miami developer Jorge M. Pérez is breaking a record.

MultiFamily Executive Magazine | August 31, 2021

Related Group President Jon Paul Pérez Makes His Mark

The 2021 MFE Executive of the Year has been preparing to lead the Miami-based company for most of his life.

The Real Deal | June 01, 2021

Related Group’s Condo Kings Expand Their Realm

Miami condo king Jorge Pérez and his son Jon Paul are expanding their Related Group with a $13 billion pipeline of projects throughout the Americas…
